Description: Cylinder Distribution SupervisorTo plan and supervise coordinated daily effort of meeting delivery schedules for LPG cylinders utilizing the optimum.Contribute and provide inputs to the development of the Gas Operations and Distribution operational objectives.Monitor achievement of team’s objectives through managing performance and motivating staff to maximize subordinateProvide on-the-job training and constructive feedback to subordinates to support their overall developmentSupport the section head in utilizing an optimum section manpower so that resources are optimally utilised and communication can take place in an efficient manner.Utilize the Dispatch Solution Software to monitor LPG cylinder pick up schedule and manpower requirementsCoordinate with Fleet Services for LPG Cylinder Pickups for downtime and follow up efficient maintenance to reduce vehicle downtime.Skills
Skills: Bachelor Degree in Mechanical / Instrument / Chemical Engineering or equivalent
Driver License Holder, 5 years’ experience in fleet management, preferably in oil industry
